title: pedda dEvuDani ninnu
sahitya:
pedda dEvuDani ninnu nammitirA rAma rAma rAma rAma


anupallavi

  bhIti jendina nannu brOva samayamipuDu rArA mrokkEra


caraNam 1    siddha mArgamu teliya jAlanu kAma mArgamu modale teliyadu 
vEdAnta vcAramu sunna telisi teliyalEka shrI rAmayandu
    caraNam 2    madamulalO jorapaTudmaNTE shAnta bhAvamu gAna jAlanu 
shruti itihAsAdi purANabulu cadivi arthamE telusukO jAla
    caraNam 3    satatamu nI caraNa bhajanamu sEya manasO nilvadEmi sEtura 
gati nIvEra sadAshiva kavinuta nirvyAja karuNAmUrtE
